mapper.select: select a.*,b.avatar as friendAvatar from friend a,user b where a.myId = #{myId} and a.state != 0 and a.friendId = b.id order by applyTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into friend(myId, friendId, friendNick, state, applyTime) values(#{myId},#{friendId},#{friendNick},#{state},#{applyTime})
mapper.update: update friend set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.avatar as myAvatar,b.name as myName from friend a,user b where a.state = 0 and a.friendId=#{id} and a.myId = b.id order by applyTime desc
